           </rdf:Seq>         </items>     </channel>     <image rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/lib/tpl/zotero-theme/images/favicon.ico">         <title>Zotero Documentation</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/</link>         <url>http://www.zotero.org/support/lib/tpl/zotero-theme/images/favicon.ico</url>     </image>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/advanced?rev=1389767671&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-01-15T01:34:31-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:advanced</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/advanced?rev=1389767671&do=diff</link>         <description>The Advanced Tab has two sub-tabs: \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdGeneral\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdFiles and Folders\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd.  The General Tab    Debug Output Logging  See .  OpenURL  Here you can specify a different OpenURL resolver for use with Zotero's  feature.  If you are on an institution network, you can click the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdSearch for resolvers\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd button. If Zotero finds an OpenURL resolver belonging to your institution, you can select it using the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdCustom...\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd drop-down menu.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/cite?rev=1380067613&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2013-09-24T20:06:53-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:cite</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/cite?rev=1380067613&do=diff</link>         <description>Word Processors    Zotero's  integrate Zotero into either Microsoft Word or LibreOffice/OpenOffice.  For Zotero for Firefox, the plugins must initially be installed from the  page, and then can be reinstalled from the Cite pane of the preferences by clicking the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdReinstall Word Add-in\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd/\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdReinstall LibreOffice Add-in\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd button. Reinstallation of the LibreOffice plugin may be helpful after upgrades to LibreOffice result in a change in the path to the LibreOffice program files.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/export?rev=1332089629&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-18T12:53:49-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:export</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/export?rev=1332089629&do=diff</link>         <description>Quick Copy  Default Output Format \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Sets the style to be used when copying a reference to the clipboard using the Quick Copy shortcut keys, or drag-and-drop.  Copy as HTML \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Changes the Quick Copy output from plain text to HTML.  Site-Specific Settings \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Overrides the default Quick Copy style when a particular web site domain is open in the Firefox browser. This makes the use of different styles in different contexts quick and easy.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/general?rev=1387001656&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2013-12-14T01:14:16-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:general</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/general?rev=1387001656&do=diff</link>         <description>User Interface  This section allows you to customize Zotero\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds appearance.  Load Zotero in (Zotero for Firefox-only) - Select how Zotero integrates with the Firefox browser: via the default browser pane that allows you to browse in the same tab, via a dedicated tab, or via a Firefox App Tab.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/hidden_preferences?rev=1425823241&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-03-08T10:00:41-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:hidden_preferences</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/hidden_preferences?rev=1425823241&do=diff</link>         <description>You can edit most Zotero preferences through the  window. However, the preferences window does not include all of the different ways you can customize your copy of Zotero. To view the the full list of Zotero's preferences, including many hidden preferences, type \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdabout:config\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd into the Firefox location bar and enter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdzotero\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd into the Filter field at the top of the list that comes up. In Zotero Standalone you can access about:config from the Advanced pane of the preferences. Preferences that can \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/proxies?rev=1355193542&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-12-10T21:39:02-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:proxies</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/proxies?rev=1355193542&do=diff</link>         <description>Many institutions require you to sign-in to a proxy system to access electronic resources while you are off-campus. Zotero can help make this more convenient: When it detects that you are using an institutional proxy to access a particular site, it will ask if you want to remember it in the future. If you agree, Zotero will automatically use the proxy for matching URLs in the future. You should be routed through the proxy login site if you're not already logged in, then you can access the databa\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/search?rev=1332088416&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-18T12:33:36-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:search</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/search?rev=1332088416&do=diff</link>         <description>Full-Text Cache  Zotero creates an index of the contents of your library, including the full text of attachments, in order to facilitate searches. The Search preference pane includes buttons to clear and rebuild the index. It is also possible to set the upper limit on indexed characters per document. The default is 500,000.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/shortcut_keys?rev=1377812894&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2013-08-29T17:48:14-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:shortcut_keys</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/shortcut_keys?rev=1377812894&do=diff</link>         <description>This pane allows the user to change Zotero's default keyboard shortcuts.  Open/Close Zotero Pane - Shows/hides the Zotero pane  Toggle Fullscreen Mode - Changes whether the Zotero pane takes up the full browser window, or just a portion of it  Library - Sets the focus to your Zotero library</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/styles?rev=1294087967&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2011-01-03T15:52:47-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:styles</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/styles?rev=1294087967&do=diff</link>         <description>Style Manager    The Style Manager displays the currently installed citation styles and the date they were last updated. You can add CSL and ENS citation styles (.ens files) by clicking the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd+\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd button and locating the style file on your computer, or you can click the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdGet additional styles...\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd link to visit the Zotero Style Repository. To delete a style, select the style and click the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd-\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd button.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/sync?rev=1332087854&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-18T12:24:14-04:00</dc:date>         <title>preferences:sync</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/preferences/sync?rev=1332087854&do=diff</link>         <description>Settings    Zotero Sync Server  Provide the username and password of your Zotero account to enable . When the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdSync automatically\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd checkbox is checked, a sync is started every time you make a change to your library. Otherwise, you can manually start a sync by clicking the sync button (the circular green arrow) on the right-hand side of the Zotero pane.</description>     </item> </rdf:RDF>
